title: 3D Printed Energy Harvesting Devices for Flexible and Wearable Electronics
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4SE00824C, Review Article
Ishant G. G. Patil, Kanik Thakur, Sudhansu Sekhar Nath, Poonam Sundriyal
Ambient energy harvesting has great potential to contribute to sustainable development and address ever-emerging energy demands. Energy harvesting devices (EHDs) are particularly attractive for powering self-powered wearable and smart electronics,...
